title: WWE SmackDown
summary: WWE SmackDown, also known as Friday Night SmackDown or simply SmackDown, is an American professional wrestling television program produced by WWE that currently airs live every Friday at 8pm ET on Fox in the United States. Fox Deportes simulcasts the program with Spanish-language commentary. In Canada, SmackDown also airs on Sportsnet 360 and some Fox stations available through Canadian providers. The show features characters from the SmackDown brand, to which WWE employees are assigned to work and perform. The show is currently considered to be one of two flagship shows, along with Monday Night Raw.[4]
